name: Tennis Elbow Manager 2
description:
Become A Tennis Coach !
In this tennis manager game, you take control of a tennis coach and his player, and your goal is to reach the Number One ranking in the world, to stay there as long as possible and win as many Grand Slam titles as possible.Features:
  • Men or Women Tour
  • 3500 players evolving over 70 years, from 1973 for men & 1983 for women to 2042
  • More than 400 tournaments
  • Country Cup and Masters Cup
  • Singles & doubles
  • Junior & Pro Tours
  • Up to 9 coached players
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Full ranking system (like the entry one from ATP)
